name: NakedBacteria
body:
### Welcome to NakedBacteria
Bacteria do a lot with a little. 

NakedBacteria is a project in R that makes it possible to see where genes reside on bacterial chromosomes and compare gene content as well as [gene synteny] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Synteny) (the physical co-localization of genetic loci on the same chromosome within an individual or species) across related species. 

### Support or Contact
NakedBacteria is a project by Koshlan Mayer-Blackwell who can be reached at koshlan@stanford.edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
